name: Krak'n Waka
description:
Krak'n Waka leaves you stranded in the middle of the ocean, only a gun and a waka to your name. 

Fight the Kraken, hunt fish and defeat Tangaroa, the Maori Sea god, to find your way back to New Zealand.

Featuring:

  • Gun based combat.
  • 2 Separate boss battles.
  • Maori mythological inspiration.
  • A secret easter egg.
  • Short 15-20min runtime.
  • Super well optimized, runs on the most potato of computers.
